page.title: 08Popular T.V.Programmes
page.content: One very popular cartoon on T.V. is Tom and Jerry.Tom is a cat and Jerry is a mouse.Tom is always chasing Jerry.Jerry never gets killed though.A popular children,s programme is Blue Peter compered by two men and one lady who have a garden where they do a lot of work.The people on Blue Peter go out and do different things such as collecting money for charities and showing you how to make things.Other favourites are Dallas and Dynasty,two soap operas about American millionaires.Points of View is a programme on T.V. that people write in to and give their comments about other T.V. programmes.Grange Hill is a favourite of mine because it is about a school.
